Posts.EditableText:
If there's a Bug Report forum and a Technical Support forum, what does that leave the Developer Forum to cover?

I'm a bit reluctant to make a separate forum for bug reports because there's often confusion over whether something that happens is the fault of Quest or QDK (in which case it's a bug) or whether it's the fault of the game author (in which case that author needs technical support).

I don't think the traffic in the Developer forum is enough to warrant splitting it up. It's annoying having to go through millions of forums if they will only get a couple of messages a week.
